name: Go-Gophers :)
body:
![GoPher](https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/15053762)
### Welcome to one of the many Go Language tutorials.
My Name is Plamen Ivanov Vassilev and this is a simple landing page for a Go Lang tutorial.

### Go's way of writing the well known Hello World app 
***
```go
package main
import "fmt"

func main() {
  fmt.Println("Hello World")
}  
```
***
**GutHub Project:** [[https://github.com/go-pher/golang](https://github.com/go-pher/golang)]

**Contact me:** [[plamen.gopher@gmail.com](plamen.gopher@gmail.com)]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
